name: Dice Golf (meelooteen)
description:
(WASD to move, Q and E to shift camera)
Dice Golf is an easy to play puzzle game, where you move two dice on the board, and the number of one at the end of the move determines how much you can move the other. 
(You can download a prettier Windows build below)

This game was made for GMTK2022 game jam, where the theme was "Roll of the Dice". This was my first Game Jam ever, please be kind! 
Good luck. I hope you have fun!
